sentences: On Tuesday, 12 September, SBI Chair Ashe recalled concerns raised at SBI-12 relating to integration with the host country, namely inadequate office space and difficulties acquiring visas and work permits.
Germany provided an interim report on action being taken, noting progress that has been made to resolve these issues.
In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2000/L.2), SBI took note of the statement by Germany and invited Germany to report on progress at its next session.
enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
